page.title: 18Dodsworth Coaches
page.content: Dodsworth Coaches is a small coach firm which started after the 1914-1918 war. Its founder was H.Dodsworth (the grandfather of the present owner) with his sons, Wilf, Jack and Sid. It was sold to West Yorkshire in November 1931. Jack started in January 1932 when he bought a bus for Â£70 and had built the number of buses up to 8 when he died in 1963. The firm moved from Minskip , where it originally started, to a new site in Boroughbridge in August 1977. There are now 11 coaches, including 6 executive coaches with toilets, videos and drinks. These coaches travel all over Europe on holiday trips, visiting places such as Spain, Italy and France. The other coaches run an all year service for schools and private parties.
